page.title: 05CRICKET ST.T.-WILDLIFE PARK
page.content: Cricket St, Thomas used to be a private stately home,but it is now a very popular wildlife park.It is situated on Windwhistle Hill,fairly near to Chard.It has many birds and different animals such as elephants, tigers, snakes and many different species of monkeys.In the river there are many sealions.There's a feeding chart so you know when they are being fed.There is a train ride that goes through a forest track.There is a large fort where children can play in safety.There are two gift shops, both with souvenirs and novelties.There is also a health food shop with different products to keep you "slim and trim". The entrance fee to Cricket St.Thomas ADULTS Â£2.50 { }CHILDREN Â£1.50 The manor house was used in the popular TV series 'To The Manor Born'
